item.title: Building IoT 2018 - shaping the Internet of Things
item.description: I visited the building IoT at Cologne, Germany in June 2018. The following is a list of the talks I attended and found interesting.

item.title: How to develop Eclipse SmartHome Bindings with IntelliJ and Docker
item.description: We show you our approach on how to develop Eclipse SmartHome bindings with IntelliJ And Docker.
